umrimuski .... if anyone who hardcoded subs into movies is a racist then most of the hollwood major peoducers would be just that as they too hardcode subs when someone in the film is saying something that is not understood by those watching it...

Moving on to your question as to why I do that ... I hardcoded subs on the movies to give the chance to those who do not understand the language being spoken in the movie to enjoy the movies as others who do understand the language.

The same movie is always available on this site without subs for those who do not want the subs ... What added value do I provide by uploading the same as what others may also be uploading?

umrimuski .... again I assure u that i do not have any racist tendencies and am taking the time to reply to you only because felt that you ought to know ... 

Have a nice day ... and do try and smile :)
